entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:26 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain over northern sections this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
